name: Wasteland: New Antonio
description:
Welcome to New Antonio!

 The least irradiated part of Texas in this post apocalyptic world, and the place where it seems as though no one but you uses guns.

Things to do while you’re on vacation here!:

1: Explore the remains and ruins of a Post nuclear war San Antonio.

2: Walk down roads like highway 1604 or loop 410! I’m sure you might find some interesting things along there!

3: discover secret caches of our currency: Shells!

4: Track down and kill the man who stole your things and tried to murder you.

5: Commit mass murder on filthy raiders and hunters.

6: Visit towns like Rophy Ridge and interact with the townsfolk! Maybe even spend some Shells at a trading post or a Shop keep!

7: Or, if you’re feeling adventurous, courageous, and brave enough, take a ride to the East and take on the horrors and challenges of the much more dangerous area of Houston, and it’s “otherworldly” inhabitants.

And so much more!

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your vacation to New Antonio and leave with great stories to tell others who might want to come here!

See ya soon, partner!

This message was brought to you by:

Snap_Shot Gaming & Co.

(PRETTY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT.)
